love_letter:
My Dearest Love,
From the moment you walked into my life, everything changed. You brought a color and light I never knew was missing.
Every day with you is a gift, and I find myself falling for you over and over again. You are the kindest, strongest, and most wonderful person I have ever known.
Thank you for being you. Here's to a future filled with even more laughter and adventure.
I love you more than words can say. Happy Birthday.
Yours forever,
Devyansh
